Package ohos.event.intentagent

Class TriggerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.event.intentagent.TriggerInfo

  • public final class TriggerInfo
extends Object
    A parametric class that contains the parameters required by IntentAgentHelper#triggerIntentAgent.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Notification#ANS

    • Constructor Detail

      • TriggerInfo

        public TriggerInfo​(String permission,
                   IntentParams extraInfo,
                   Intent intent,
                   int code)
        A constructor used to create a TriggerInfo instance based on the input parameters.
        Parameters:
        permission - Indicates the permission required for an IntentAgent recipient. This parameter is valid only when the IntentAgent is triggered to send common events.
        extraInfo - Indicates the custom extra data you want to add for triggering an IntentAgent.
        intent - Indicates the extra Intent. If flags in IntentAgentInfo contains IntentAgentConstant.Flags#CONSTANT_FLAG, this parameter is invalid. If flags contains IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ELEMENT, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ACTION, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_URI, IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_ENTITIES, and IntentAgentConstant.Flags#REPLACE_BUNDLE, the element, action, uri, entities, and bundleName attributes of the Intent specified in this parameter will be used to replace the corresponding attributes in the original Intent, respectively. If this parameter is null, the original Intent remains unchanged.
        code - Indicates the result code provided for the target of the IntentAgent.
        Since:
        3

      • TriggerInfo

        public TriggerInfo​(TriggerInfo paramInfo)
        A constructor used to create a TriggerInfo instance by copying parameters from an existing one.
        Parameters:
        paramInfo - Indicates the existing TriggerInfo object.
        Since:
        3
